page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE - PIERS
page.content: On Thursday, 4th July, I woke up and remembered it was Sports day. I got dressed, had breakfast and went to school. We worked in the morning and practised the relay to see who would be in it. After dinner we watched the Obstacle race heats. When the sports started our first race was Ball and spoon. I came first for Adhurst (my team). I came nowhere in the next race, but I was 3rd in the shuttle and 3rd in the 60 metres. At the end the shield was presented to Stoner, the winning team. After that there were some speeches, and cards and presents were given to our Headmaster because he is retiring this term. The parents put on a tea party for us all. When I got home Dad had come back from Egypt and he showed me his new car. Just before supper he gave me a racing car game and I played before going to bed.
